definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: He is antipathetic to new ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他天生就封新观念起反感。

sentences.english: Slipper dream compared to the people, Kate has overturned that idea.
sentences.chinese: 相比人们的水晶鞋梦，凯特却颠覆了这种观念。

sentences.english: Jack has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.
sentences.chinese: 杰克对所有这些现代观念都抱有相当偏颇的看法。

sentences.english: We rarely think to question the financialconcepts we believe in and follow.—Garrett B. Gunderson, Killing Sacred Cows
sentences.chinese: 我们几乎不去质疑自己相信和遵循的理财观念。

sentences.english: May, who took office earlier this month, is the starkest proponent of this.
sentences.chinese: 本月初就职的梅是这种观念最鲜明的倡导者。

sentences.english: Have taken place in people's consumption of a major change.
sentences.chinese: 人们的消费观念已经发生了较大的转变。

sentences.english: Equilibrium is the product of an axiomatic system.
sentences.chinese: 均衡观念是公理系统的产物。

sentences.english: Signification, on the other hand, comes into play in the Vorstellung.
sentences.chinese: 在另一方面，真实意义是在观念的领域运作。

sentences.english: Teachers should be responsible and time-oriented.
sentences.chinese: 教师要有责任感且要时间观念很强。

sentences.english: The selling concept takes an inside-out perspective.
sentences.chinese: 推销观念采用一种由内而外的视角。

sentences.english: The correct direction of cultural value for collegians should be highlighted in current college education.
sentences.chinese: 当前的大学教育应该注意正确的文化价值观念的引导。

sentences.english: So he hold his realism by developing his theory on verisimilitude.
sentences.chinese: 这样他就借助逼真性观念坚持了自己的实在论。

sentences.english: Since China gone to the slavery society, the ideas of "filial piety" had bud in China .
sentences.chinese: 自从进入奴隶社会，中国就有了“孝”观念的萌芽。

sentences.english: According to the Chinese tradition's idea, smokes is the bad woman's symbol.
sentences.chinese: 按照中国人传统的观念，抽烟是坏女人的象征。

sentences.english: Ann: Hardship is one thing, the other thing is the conceptions and practices of child education.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦是一回事，教育孩子的观念和做法又是另一回事。

sentences.english: England still hasn't caught up to the concept of the hyphenated identity.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰还不能跟上联众认同的观念。
